verses.text: Doth not \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*? and \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* put \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* her \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*?

She \w standeth|strong="H5324"\w* in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of high \w places|strong="H4791"\w*, by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* in the \w places|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*.

She \w crieth|strong="H7442"\w* \w at|strong="H3027"\w* the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, at the \w entry|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w city|strong="H7176"\w*, at the \w coming|strong="H3996"\w* in at the \w doors|strong="H6607"\w*.
Unto you, O \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, I \w call|strong="H7121"\w*; and my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \add is\add* to the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.

O ye \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*, \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H6195"\w*: and, ye \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*, be ye of an \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*; for I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* of excellent \w things|strong="H5057"\w*; and the \w opening|strong="H4669"\w* of my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \add shall be\add* right \w things|strong="H4339"\w*.

For my \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1897"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*; and \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* \add is\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.\f + \fr 8.7 \ft an…: Heb. the abomination of my lips\f*

All the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \add are\add* in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*; \add there is\add* nothing \w froward|strong="H6617"\w* or \w perverse|strong="H6141"\w* in them.\f + \fr 8.8 \ft froward: Heb. wreathed\f*
They \add are\add* all \w plain|strong="H5228"\w* to him that \w understandeth|strong="H0995"\w*, and \w right|strong="H3477"\w* to them that \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

\w Receive|strong="H3947"\w* my \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*, and not \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; and \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* rather than \w choice|strong="H0977"\w* \w gold|strong="H2742"\w*.

For \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \w rubies|strong="H6443"\w*; and all the things that may be \w desired|strong="H2656"\w* are not to be \w compared|strong="H7737"\w* to it.

I \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* with \w prudence|strong="H6195"\w*, and find \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* of witty \w inventions|strong="H4209"\w*.\f + \fr 8.12 \ft prudence: or, subtilty\f*

The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* to \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: \w pride|strong="H1344"\w*, and \w arrogancy|strong="H1347"\w*, and the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and the \w froward|strong="H8419"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, do I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w*.
\w Counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \add is\add* mine, and sound \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w*: I \add am\add* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*; I have \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*.
By me \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and \w princes|strong="H7336"\w* \w decree|strong="H2710"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*.
By me \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w rule|strong="H8323"\w*, and \w nobles|strong="H5081"\w*, \add even\add* all the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
I \w love|strong="H0157"\w* them that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* me; and those that seek me \w early|strong="H7836"\w* shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* me.
\w Riches|strong="H6239"\w* and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* \add are\add* with me; \add yea\add*, \w durable|strong="H6276"\w* \w riches|strong="H1952"\w* and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

My \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \w gold|strong="H2742"\w*, yea, than fine \w gold|strong="H6337"\w*; and my \w revenue|strong="H8393"\w* than \w choice|strong="H0977"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

I \w lead|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w way|strong="H0734"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*:\f + \fr 8.20 \ft lead: or, walk\f*
That I may cause those that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* me to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* \w substance|strong="H3426"\w*; and I will \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* their \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w possessed|strong="H7069"\w* me in the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w before|strong="H6924"\w* his \w works|strong="H4659"\w* of old.
I was set \w up|strong="H5258"\w* from \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*, from the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w*, or \w ever|strong="H6924"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* was.

When \add there were\add* no \w depths|strong="H8415"\w*, I was brought \w forth|strong="H2342"\w*; when \add there were\add* no \w fountains|strong="H4599"\w* \w abounding|strong="H3513"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.
Before the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* were \w settled|strong="H2883"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* was I brought \w forth|strong="H2342"\w*:

While as yet he had not \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, nor the \w fields|strong="H2351"\w*, nor the highest \w part|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*.\f + \fr 8.26 \ft fields: or, open places\f*\f + \fr 8.26 \ft the highest…: or, the chief part\f*

When he \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, I \add was\add* there: when he \w set|strong="H2710"\w* a \w compass|strong="H2329"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w depth|strong="H8415"\w*:\f + \fr 8.27 \ft a compass: or, a circle\f*

When he \w established|strong="H0553"\w* the \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*: when he \w strengthened|strong="H5810"\w* the \w fountains|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w deep|strong="H8415"\w*:

When he \w gave|strong="H7760"\w* to the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* his \w decree|strong="H2706"\w*, that the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* should not \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* his \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w*: when he \w appointed|strong="H2710"\w* the \w foundations|strong="H4144"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*:

Then I was by \w him|strong="H0681"\w*, \add as\add* one brought \w up|strong="H0525"\w* \add with him:\add* and I was \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \add his\add* \w delight|strong="H8191"\w*, \w rejoicing|strong="H7832"\w* \w always|strong="H6256"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him;

\w Rejoicing|strong="H7832"\w* in the habitable \w part|strong="H8398"\w* of his \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and my \w delights|strong="H8191"\w* \add were\add* with the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

Now therefore \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, O ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: for \w blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add are they that\add* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.
\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*, and be \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*, and \w refuse|strong="H6544"\w* it not.

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* me, \w watching|strong="H8245"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* at my \w gates|strong="H1817"\w*, \w waiting|strong="H8104"\w* at the \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* of my \w doors|strong="H6607"\w*.

For whoso \w findeth|strong="H4672"\w* me \w findeth|strong="H4672"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, and shall \w obtain|strong="H6329"\w* \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 8.35 \ft obtain: Heb. bring forth\f*

But he that \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w* against me \w wrongeth|strong="H2554"\w* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: all they that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.
